00191   // strategies for fixpoint evaluation insaturation context
00192   // BFS = do each g_i once then go to g_i+1
00193   // DFS = do each g_i to saturation then go to g_i+1
00194   enum fixpointStrategy {BFS, DFS};
00195

00197   static fixpointStrategy fixpointStrategy_;
00198  public :
00199   static fixpointStrategy getFixpointStrategy() { return fixpointStrategy_; }
00200   static void setFixpointStrategy(fixpointStrategy strat) { fixpointStrategy_ = strat; }

00331 namespace std {
00334   template<>  struct less<GShom> {
00335     bool operator()(const GShom &g1,const GShom &g2) const{
00336       return g1<g2;
00337     }

00341 /**********************************************************************/
00345 class _GShom 
00346 {
00347 private:
00349   friend class GShom;
00351   friend class Shom;
00354   mutable int refCounter;
00359   mutable bool marking;
00363   mutable bool immediat;
00365     GSDD eval_skip(const GSDD &) const;
00366   
00367 public:
00368 
00372     virtual bool
00373     skip_variable(int) const
00374     {
00375         return false;
00376     }
00377 
00380     virtual bool
00381     is_selector() const
00382     {
00383         return false;
00384     }
00385 
00387       virtual const GShom::range_t get_range () const 
00388     {
00389       return GShom::full_range;
00390     }
00391 
00394   _GShom(int ref=0,bool im=false):refCounter(ref),marking(false),immediat(im){};
00397   virtual ~_GShom(){};
00398 
00402   virtual bool operator==(const _GShom &h) const=0;
00407   virtual size_t hash() const=0;
00408 
00409   // for use by unique table : return new MyConcreteClassName(*this);
00410   virtual _GShom * clone () const =0 ;
00411 
00412 
00416   virtual GSDD eval(const GSDD &) const=0;
00417 
00419   virtual void mark() const{};
00420 
00421   virtual void print (std::ostream & os) const = 0;
00422 public:
00423     
00424     // Enable access to the concrete GSHom for _GSHom homorphisms
00427     static
00428         const _GShom*
00429     get_concret(const GShom& gshom)
00430     {
00431         return gshom.concret;
00432     }
00433 
00434     // produce the predescessor homomorphism, using pot to compute variable domains
00435     virtual GShom invert (const GSDD & ) const { 
00436       // default = raise assert
00437       if ( is_selector() ) {
00438         // A default implmentation is provided for selector homomorphisms, overloadable.
00439         // sel^-1 (s) = pot - sel(pot) + s = ((pot-sel(pot)) + id)
00440         // return  ( (pot - GShom(this)(pot))+ GShom::id ); 
00441         // NEW VERSION : the invert of a selection is itself...
00442         return this;
00443       }
00444       // No default implem if ! is_selector 
00445       std::cerr << "Cannot invert homomorphism : " ;
00446       print (std::cerr);
00447       std::cerr << std::endl ;
00448       assert(0); 
00449       return Shom::null;
00450     }
00451 
00452 };

00463 {
00464 public:
00467   StrongShom(){};

00474   virtual GSDD phiOne() const{return GSDD::top;}; 
00479   virtual GShom phi(int var,const DataSet& val) const=0;
00481   virtual bool operator==(const StrongShom &h) const=0;
00485   bool operator==(const _GShom &h) const;
00486 
00488   virtual void print (std::ostream & os) const ;
00489 
00496   GSDD eval(const GSDD &)const;  
00497 };
